entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow in Forillon Park this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 except northwest 60 gusting to 90 in Forillon Park this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
